|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = AsiaRF MM610X |rad2modif = SDIO/UART |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Morse Micro;MM6108;MM6108-A1; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11ah |rad2freq = <!-- 2.4 or 5 or 6, Frequency band(s) of this radio -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{WPLink|Morse_Micro}}
===Feature=== *Four Modes Wireless: Wi-Fi 4, Wi-Fi HaLow, BLE and [[Zigbee]] :combined in one [[IoT]] Smart Control Gateway *Wi-Fi HaLow: Max Data Rate up to 32.8Mbps @8MHz ch. BW :Chips: Morse Micro MM6108 *Wi-Fi 4: Max Data Rate up to 150Mbps :Chips: [[MediaTek]] MT7688 chipset @580MHz ([[MIPS]]) :Security: 64/128-bits WEP, TKIP, WPA, WPA2, AES, WPS :Support boot from Flash, Plug and Play :Multi-modes: Gateway, AP/Client :AP Mode/STA Mode/Bridge Mode *Network Features: DHCP Client/Relay/Server, :Dynamic DNS, DNS Cache/Proxy, NTP Client *Wi-Fi: :Support Multiple SSID :Clock rate up to 400MHz Legacy and High Throughput Modes :Support WPS, QoS-WMM, WMM-PS, P2P :High security with build-in: WEP 64/128, :TKIP, WPA, WPA mixed, 802.1x, 802.11i :1x Authentication with RADIUS Client
===See also=== *[[AsiaRF AP7628-UWH]] • 802.11ah Wi-Fi HaLow IoT Gateway • [https://asiarf.com/product/802-11ah-wi-fi-halow-iot-ethernet-to-usb-c-dongle-ap7628-uwh/ PPage] *[[AsiaRF AP7688-WHM]] • 802.11ah BLE Wi-Fi HaLow IoT Gateway • [https://asiarf.com/product/802-11ah-wi-fi-halow-iot-gateway-ap7688-whm/ PPage] *[[AsiaRF ARFHL-AP]] • Dual-Band Wi-Fi HaLow MESH Gateway • [https://asiarf.com/product/wi-fi-halow-iot-gateway-arfhl-ap/ PPage] *[[AsiaRF ARFHL-UM]] • Dual-Band Wi-Fi HaLow Mesh Portable Gateway • [https://asiarf.com/product/wi-fi-halow-wearable-gateway-mt7628-arfhl-um/ PPage]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
